channel.title: RSCEmulation - A Runescape Classic Private Server [ Over 4 years running! ]
channel.description:
[b]RSCEmulation[/b] [url=http://www.rscemulation.org]RuneScape Classic Private Server[/url]
RSCEmulation is the biggest and most developed [url=http://www.rscemulation.org]RuneScape Classic[/url] private server which launched on 24th August, 2009 By Luke Leary aka Kryptix. Luke Leary passed away on June 13th, 2012 in a tragic motorcycle accident. Luke devoted his life to developing RSCEmulation and has succeeded in making it the biggest, most active, longest running [url=http://www.rscemulation.org]Runescape Classic[/url] private server to date. Since Lukes passing, I stepped up to keep RSCEmulation running, for all you [url=http://www.rscemulation.net]Runescape Classic[/url] fanatics. I further plan to keep development moving forward, with RSCEmulation. We're the first and only [url=http://www.rscemulation.org]RuneScape Classic private server[/url] to have every skill complete including Agility (and even the popular RS2 skill Runecrafting). We currently have 19 quests (all F2P quests including Dragon slayer) with more being developed.
If you're after a semi-replica [url=http://www.rscemulation.org]RuneScape Classic private server[/url] that's reliable, stable, secure and most importantly still going to be here tomorrow then come and give us a shot. We're over 4 years old and have consistently seen thousands of players playing daily.
[b]Statistics & Information[/b] Launched: 24th August, 2009 Average Online: 125-150 Peak Online: 200 XP Rate: 5x for non-subscribers, 8x for subscribers (this increases when training in the wilderness) Registered Players: 65,000 +
[b]Getting Started[/b] 1. Go to [url=http://www.rscemulation.org]RSCEmulation's website[/url] and [url=http://www.rscemulation.org/register.html]register a account[/url]. 2. Go to the [url=http://www.rscemulation.org/character_management.html]Character Management[/url] page and [url=http://www.rscemulation.org/character_management.html?action=create]create a character[/url]. 3. Go to the [url=http://play.rscemulation.org]Play RSCEmulation[/url] page to download the client or [url=http://play.rscemulation.org]load the webclient[/url]. 4. Login to RSCEmulation using your character login credentials you created in step two.
If you have any trouble getting in-game feel free to either post a topic in our support section or [url=http://www.rscemulation.org/irc.html]join us in IRC[/url] for a live chat. Either way we will get you up and running as soon as possible. :)
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qorC4PP_RtY&feature=c4-overview&list=UUNMciSRMTIw0PMMCV_1_e0w[/youtube]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZSLXM0NVYVc[/youtube]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gju84jgl6gs&feature=c4-overview&list=UUNMciSRMTIw0PMMCV_1_e0w[/youtube]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iLv6PnzT_Ng&feature=player_embedded[/youtube]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=34pMhpG1Qik&feature=player_embedded[/youtube]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=tkRX6xg8Yhs[/youtube]
[img]http://img291.imageshack.us/img291/1491/RSCEmulation20101003191.png[/img] [img]http://img834.imageshack.us/img834/3597/65424476.png[/img]
[img]http://img841.imageshack.us/img841/2671/43168002.png[/img] [img]http://img806.imageshack.us/img806/4962/66729373.png[/img]
[img]http://img819.imageshack.us/img819/2394/47569460.jpg[/img] [img]http://img808.imageshack.us/img808/893/74927616.png[/img]
[img]http://img135.imageshack.us/img135/6264/68782140.jpg[/img] [img]http://img718.imageshack.us/img718/6548/93082366.png[/img]
[img]http://img37.imageshack.us/img37/6940/25465891.png[/img]
New RSC style trading (no tacky ::OFFER commands):
[img]http://img829.imageshack.us/img829/9849/RSCEmulation20101003191x.png[/img] [img]http://img829.imageshack.us/img829/1491/RSCEmulation20101003191.png[/img]
[b]Webclient[/b] We also now have a [url=http://play.rscemulation.org/]webclient[/url] for you to play on. Change the width in the URL if you want to change the client size.
[b]IRC[/b] You can either use [url=http://www.rscemulation.org/irc.html]RSCEmulation's IRC web client[/url] or connect through your own IRC client: //server -m irc.rizon.net -j #RSCEmulation
[b]Ventrilo[/b] Our Ventrilo normally has 5-20 players online: RSCEmulation.typefrag.com - Port 7265
[url=http://www.gametracker.com/server_info/74.217.195.66:7265/][img]http://cache.www.gametracker.com/server_info/74.217.195.66:7265/b_560_95_1.png[/img][/url]
[b]YouTube[/b] Please view [url=http://www.youtube.com/RSCEmulation]RSCEmulation's YouTube channel[/url] for [url=http://www.youtube.com/RSCEmulation]videos of RSCEmulation[/url].
[b]RSCEmulation[/b] [url=http://www.rscemulation.org]Index[/url] [url=http://www.rscemulation.org/login.html]Login[/url] [url=http://www.rscemulation.org/register.html]Register[/url] [url=http://www.rscemulation.org/subscribe.html]Subscribe[/url] [url=http://www.rscemulation.org/rules.html]Rules[/url] [url=http://www.rscemulation.org/about.html]About & FAQ[/url] [url=http://www.rscemulation.org/forum]Forum[/url] [url=http://play.rscemulation.org]Webclient[/url]
[url=http://www.rscemulation.org/character_management.html]Character Management[/url] [url=http://www.rscemulation.org/highscores.html]Highscores[/url]
We look forward to having you come join us at [url=http://www.rscemulation.org/]RSCEmulation[/url] See you there!

potential kilo:

best server for runescape classic to date. mitas well keep the players together and play here

QFT.

Though, I wouldn’t mind a remake of RSCA F2P on a clean database using RSCE’s framework. I think that will bring the players back, provided that the experience rate isn’t too low… I think 8-10x would be ideal for such a server. But that’s just me.

item.title: RSCEmulation - A Runescape Classic Private Server [ Over 4 years running! ]
item.dc:creator: @Jost Jost
item.description:
@Jost wrote:

Dear RSCE old and new players

[b]In light of recent events, Mod Jost and Mod Louie are going to reevaluate bans. If you were not banned for botting or duping send your information and what happened to either one of us. We will review each ban. It’s best to send a complete list of the characters you wish to have reviewed. We will be looking into them and if you were banned for somehow creating an unfair advantage for yourself; you will remained banned. We look forward to seeing you return to RSCE.

See you soon,

Mod Louie and Mod Jost

TELL YOUR FRIENDS[/b]

http://www.rscemulation.org/forum/viewtopic.php?id=90083

Read full topic
item.source: RSCEmulation - A Runescape Classic Private Server [ Over 4 years running! ]

You’re a fucking idiot kid. You just bashed revolution for banning with no proof, you are a botter, stop lying. Everyone knows mod tom is a fucking faggot, but if he false bans users he will be demoted. Contact pyru via pm and show him proof you weren’t botting and were banned.

item.description:
@sklem wrote:

Lol

You are banned from this forum. The administrator or moderator that banned you left the following message:

mass bot use

Please direct any inquiries to the forum administrator at support@rscemulation.org.

The fact is I never bothered to bot there. I haven’t played RSCE since 2013 summer (and then for like 1 week max). All I have done is browse the forums since the rollback took place (was looking for total wipe). And the support e-mail is not working, just got error about delivery.

Guess it is the best server out there!
